name: Simantik
description:
Simantik is a first-person survival shooter set in an anti-utopian world with steampunk elements.

The world is harsh. You are a representative of the authorities, who ended up on a prison island, it is located in the very north, constant cold is your companion. But only in the south of the island is much warmer due to active geysers, only there you can see at least a little greenery.
In this place, an incident recently occurred after which people from the island stopped communicating, you have to figure out what happened.
All the survivors on the island barricaded themselves in the cities surrounded by crowds of evil spirits. Many monsters also received their abilities and powers, so they should not be underestimated. Look for supplies in every house, use any weapon and any items to reach the goal and survive!
Chat with the characters to learn their story and thoughts about what is happening. Perhaps this place is not what it seems, an unusual prison, but something else ... But this can only be known - you

This is not a story of triumph, this is a story of universal death.
Can you escape it and save everyone? Try it, maybe you can save the world!
The story will take you all over the island, you will be able to talk to the characters, getting to know their little problems and their big grief. You can talk to every person in this world, get a task from them, which is not always solved unambiguously, the main thing is to be attentive to details, even a trifle can lead you in a different way. Notes and pages of journals will complement the history of this world or shed light on tasks from the characters.

The world is dangerous, isn't it? To repel your enemies, you have an excellent selection of weapons made in an unusual style and with their own characteristics:
  • Drum pistols
  • Revolver shotguns
  • Muskets
  • Rifles
  • Steam carabiners
  • Axes, swords and other melee weapons
In total, you can meet about 20 types of weapons, each of which you can modify by highlighting features.
But watch out for your favorite pistol, because even it can suddenly break right in your hands!

This evil has no end! They are ready to tear you apart, but do not think of them as an easy target. Once you relax, they won't give you a single chance!
You will be able to meet more than 20 types of monsters. Many of them are simple converts who run into the gap and grab you, but some...
Each area has its own unique monsters that have their own tactics and abilities, meeting with such can be fatal! Use all the items to get out of such a fight alive. Do you like walking at night? Here it is better to be more careful with this, at night those creatures come out that will quietly pursue you until they turn you into a corpse cooling down in the freezing cold of the island!
